00108 void ED_operatormacros_node(void)
00109 {
00110     wmOperatorType *ot;
00111     wmOperatorTypeMacro *mot;
00112     
00113     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("NODE_OT_duplicate_move", "Duplicate", OPTYPE_UNDO|OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00114     ot->description = "Duplicate selected nodes and move them";
00115     WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "NODE_OT_duplicate");
00116     WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "TRANSFORM_OT_translate");
00117 
00118     /* modified operator call for duplicating with input links */
00119     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("NODE_OT_duplicate_move_keep_inputs", "Duplicate", OPTYPE_UNDO|OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00120     ot->description = "Duplicate selected nodes keeping input links and move them";
00121     mot = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "NODE_OT_duplicate");
00122     RNA_boolean_set(mot->ptr, "keep_inputs", TRUE);
00123     WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "TRANSFORM_OT_translate");
00124 
00125     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("NODE_OT_select_link_viewer", "Link Viewer", OPTYPE_UNDO);
00126     ot->description = "Select node and link it to a viewer node";
00127     WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "NODE_OT_select");
00128     WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "NODE_OT_link_viewer");
00129 
00130     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("NODE_OT_move_detach_links", "Detach", OPTYPE_UNDO|OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00131     ot->description = "Move a node to detach links";
00132     WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "NODE_OT_links_detach");
00133     mot = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "TRANSFORM_OT_translate");
00134     RNA_boolean_set(mot->ptr, "release_confirm", TRUE);
00135 }
00136 
00137 void node_keymap(struct wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00138 {
00139     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00140     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00141     
00142     /* Entire Editor only ----------------- */
00143     keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Node Generic", SPACE_NODE, 0);
00144     
00145     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_properties", NKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00146     
00147     /* Main Area only ----------------- */
00148     keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Node Editor", SPACE_NODE, 0);
00149     
00150     /* mouse select in nodes used to be both keys, but perhaps this should be reduced? 
00151      * NOTE: mouse-clicks on left-mouse will fall through to allow transform-tweak, but also link/resize
00152      * NOTE 2: socket select is part of the node select operator, to handle overlapping cases
00153      */
00154     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select", ACTIONMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00155         RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", FALSE);
00156     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00157         RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", FALSE);
00158     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select", ACTIONMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00159         RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", TRUE);
00160     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00161         RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", TRUE);
00162     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select_border", EVT_TWEAK_S, KM_ANY, 0, 0);
00163         RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "tweak", TRUE);
00164     
00165     /* each of these falls through if not handled... */
00166     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_link", LEFTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00167     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_resize", LEFTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00168     
00169     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_links_cut", LEFTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00170     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select_link_viewer", LEFTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT|KM_CTRL, 0);
00171     
00172     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_backimage_move", MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00173     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_backimage_zoom", VKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00174         RNA_float_set(kmi->ptr, "factor", 0.83333f);
00175     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_backimage_zoom", VKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00176         RNA_float_set(kmi->ptr, "factor", 1.2f);
00177     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_backimage_sample", ACTIONMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00178 
00179     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_link_make", FKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00180     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "replace", FALSE);
00181     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_link_make", FKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00182     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "replace", TRUE);
00183 
00184     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "NODE_MT_add", AKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00185     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_duplicate_move", DKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00186     /* modified operator call for duplicating with input links */
00187     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_duplicate_move_keep_inputs", DKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT|KM_CTRL, 0);
00188     
00189     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_hide_toggle", HKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00190     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_mute_toggle", MKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00191     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_preview_toggle", HKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00192     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_hide_socket_toggle", HKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00193     
00194     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_show_cyclic_dependencies", CKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00195     
00196     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_view_all", HOMEKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00197 
00198     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select_border", BKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00199     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "tweak", FALSE);
00200 
00201     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_delete", XKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00202     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_delete", DELKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00203     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_delete_reconnect", XKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00204 
00205     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select_all", AKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00206     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select_linked_to", LKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00207     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select_linked_from", LKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00208     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select_same_type", GKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00209     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select_same_type_next", RIGHTBRACKETKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00210     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_select_same_type_prev", LEFTBRACKETKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00211 
00212     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_group_make", GKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00213     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_group_ungroup", GKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00214     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_group_edit", TABKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00215     
00216     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_read_renderlayers", RKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00217     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_read_fullsamplelayers", RKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00218     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "NODE_OT_render_changed", ZKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00219     
00220     transform_keymap_for_space(keyconf, keymap, SPACE_NODE);
00221 }
